TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer

Docs.summary: Exposes the subtree for the data items in a to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks When data items are shown in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], the system creates a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> subtree for the data items. The system also creates an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> for each data item. When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for the data item is created, this TabItemWrapperAutomationPeer is also created. The two peers then merge to form a single peer.
